title: Tvvo sermons the former, concerning the right use of Christian liberty, preached at S. Pauls Crosse London. May 6. The later, concerning the perswasion of conscience, preached at a metropoliticall visitation at Grantham Lincoln: Aug. 22. 1634. By Robert Saunderson chaplaine to his Maiestie.
author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for R. Dawlman and L. Fawne at the signe of the Brazen serpent in Pauls Churchyard,
notes: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: pi²  A-N⁴ O² .
Variant: title page line 8 reads: 6. May 1632.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
